title: Exquisite Kundan Work Haaram - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: and Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features the exquisite 'Hyderabadi Polish' for a lasting luster.
features: Intricate Kundan setting highlighting the floral and heart motifs, embodying traditional South Indian design. Delicate gold chain links connect each pendant. The central heart pendant adds a touch of modern romance to this classic design. The Kundan stones are meticulously placed to create a brilliant sparkle.
colors: Predominantly Gold with accents of Ruby red
and dazzling white from the Cubic Zirconia stones.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or Half-Saree Functions. Its delicate design also makes it suitable for more modern
description: This Kundan Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The high purity gold and meticulously placed Kundan stones create a piece of lasting value. The blend of traditional South Indian design with a modern touch makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. It's a statement piece that exudes grace and sophistication, perfect for cherishing for generations. Symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it an auspicious gift.
